name: The Strongest Power Ever, DIO
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose 1 level X or lower 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of those cards. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: My power grows exponentially!

name: The Guardian of Hell, P.S
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage."

name: Set's Alessi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Darby Younger & Atum
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if your hand has 5 or more cards, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, Wager your soul in a game. Replay@ Wager your soul in a game Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. Otherwise, put this card into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: I'll let you decide. Who shall be my first opponent?

name: Arrogant and Disrespectful, DIO
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 yellow character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Hmph!

name: The Miasma of the Void, C.I
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, you cannot play events or "Backup" from your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory.
flavorText: Your strength pales in comparison to the harbinger of death that is my Stand.

name: The Gun Is Mightier Than the Sword, Hol Horse
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Hol Horse's Life Philosophy" is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, choose 1 of your 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: With him gone, this game is in the bag!

name: Geb's N'doul
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters get +1000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack." 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Bast's Mariah
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 1 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: Card of the Goddess Bast. Stand User: Mariah.

name: Invincible Brothers, Zenyatta & Mondatta
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +6000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: God of the Dead, Anubis
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】. 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each marker underneath this card. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if all of your characters are 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》, you may look at the top card of your deck. If you do, put that card face down underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Anubis: "No one in the world is stronger than you. You shall wield me, and you shall kill!"

name: Darby Elder & Osiris
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, Wager your soul in a game. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your other characters, and put it into your stock. Replay@ Wager your soul in a game All players choose 1 of their characters, and put the top card of their decks into their waiting rooms. If the level of the card put into your waiting room by this effect is lower than the level of the card put into your opponent's waiting room by this effect, put the character you chose into your waiting room. Otherwise, your opponent puts the character they chose into their waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: I am here due to the simple fact that I am a born gambler!

name: Final Attack, DIO
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have 4 or more other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, this card gets +6000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, you may choose 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: I'll obliterate you!

name: Ultimate Existence, DIO
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your yellow characters in front of this card get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Complete Being, DIO & T.W" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [(2) Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] If your level is 3 or higher, choose 1 "Complete Being, DIO & T.W" marker underneath this card, and put it on any position of your stage. At the end of the turn, you may put that character face up underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Joestar, you bastard, you're watching me. Well, watch this!

name: Horrifying Execution, DIO
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] If this card is in your waiting room, when "Stand Rush!!" is placed on your climax area, your level is 2 or higher, and all of your characters are 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》, you may pay the cost. If you do, put this card in any position of your stage, and this card gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character on the top of your opponent's deck."
flavorText: I've still devised a way to execute you so regardless of how long you can move in my world, you'll never escape your demise!

name: Refreshed Feeling, DIO
text: 【CONT】 If your opponent has a level 3 or higher character, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, this card gets +2500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 yellow card from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: This was my escape route to your grandfather. And now his blood is mine!

name: Complete Being, DIO & T.W
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if "World of Stopped Time" is in your climax area, and there are no characters in your opponent's center stage or all characters in their center stage are 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent puts the top 2 cards of their deck into their clock.
flavorText: The World!!

name: DIO's World
text: [Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] You may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Greetings, Polnareff. What a pleasant surprise.

name: Hol Horse's Life Philosophy
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Very well said, my little sweetheart!

name: Stand Rush!!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: World of Stopped Time
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: The World!

name: All-Consuming Flame, Avdol
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card.
flavorText: Hell is near, so prepare... for Hell 2 U!

name: Life-Or-Death Battle, Iggy
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage.
flavorText: Might wanna keep still. Looks like you're losing a lot of blood there.

name: Searching for His Nemesis, Polnareff
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I would use my own Stand as a tool of righteous vengeance!

name: Veteran Guide, Joseph & H.P
text: 【AUTO】 When your other character is placed on the stage from a marker area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 or 《Hamon》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: It's our destiny, a path that until now, has been unknown.

name: Instantaneous Reaction, Avdol
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your memory] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other characters, and return it to your hand.

name: Passionately Cool, Jotaro
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to the open middle position of your center stage. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: There's not a person on the planet who could stay calm after seeing that!

name: Joestar Family Heritage, Jotaro
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your stock into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 cost 0 or lower 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character with level equal to or lower than your level, put it in any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 During this card's battle, when the damage you received is canceled, you may put this card into your stock.
flavorText: And I still have one strategy left.

name: Favorite Cherry, Kakyoin
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Lick, lick, lick, lick...

name: Ora Ora Rush, Jotaro & S.P
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Star of Hope, Jotaro & S.P" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I'll kick your ass soon enough.

name: Breakthrough, Kakyoin
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Return this card to your hand & Put 1 "Emerald Splash" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the beginning of your attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, and 【STAND】 it.
flavorText: Anything that touches this web is instantly fired upon! And you're surrounded for twenty meters on all sides!

name: Veteran of Battle, Joseph
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 or 《Hamon》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Like a fine wine, I guess I just get better with age.

name: Faster Than the Eye Can See, Polnareff & S.C
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, you may have this card get -1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. If you do, this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage."
flavorText: First, let me show you all something that will really freak you out...

name: The Only Way, Jotaro
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: I might be able to find out... What's hiding in that darkness.

name: Reliable Ally, Kakyoin
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if all of your characters are 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn." 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] If this card is in your waiting room, when your "The Only Way, Jotaro" is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, you may put this card in any position of your stage.
flavorText: If I ever fall in love, I'd want it to be with someone like her.

name: Using the Last of His Life, Iggy
text: 【CONT】 Memory If "Instantaneous Reaction, Avdol" is in your memory, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if your memory has 2 or less cards, you may put this card into your memory.

name: "Soulful" All In, Jotaro
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, Wager your soul in a game. Replay@ Wager your soul in a game Shuffle your deck, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character, choose 1 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. Otherwise, put this card into your waiting room. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Jotaro: "And while I'm at it, I'll throw in Avdol's soul."

name: Victory in Hand, Polnareff & S.C
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Sadness at Losing a Friend" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: My name is Jean Pierre Polnareff.

name: The Man Who Returned, Avdol
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 cost 1 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it into their waiting room.
flavorText: Tsk, tsk, tsk, tsk.

name: Looking for Love, Polnareff
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."
flavorText: I wanna meet a girl who feels the same way about me as I do for her!

name: Overdrive, Joseph
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 or 《Hamon》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Now take this! Hamon of the Sun!

name: Strength at the Eleventh Hour, Jotaro
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: I got a question for you. You like sumo? Especially deadlocks at the edge of the ring...?

name: Star Finger, Jotaro
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: What's that? I can't hear you!

name: In a Dream, Kakyoin
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "In a Dream, H.G" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] Choose 1 "In a Dream, H.G" marker underneath this card, and put it on any position of your stage. At the end of the turn, you may put that character face up underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Anything is possible in a dream, right? So healing a cut should be easy.

name: Remote Spirit Photography, Joseph
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, and put them on the top of their deck in any order.
flavorText: Get ready... Let me introduce... my Stand!

name: Arriving in Egypt, Jotaro
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may 【REVERSE】 that character."

name: In a Dream, H.G
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1500 power for each of your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's memory.
flavorText: Death 13: "He's turned into a snake-like thing... and he's slithering into my ear!"

name: Carrying Their Will in His Heart, Polnareff
text: 【CONT】 Memory If "Instantaneous Reaction, Avdol" and "Using the Last of His Life, Iggy" are in your memory, this card gets +3500 power and +1 soul.

name: Creation of Flames, Avdol & M.R
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if all of your characters are 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》, this card gets +6000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 "Creation of Flames, Avdol & M.R" in your memory, and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: Perhaps you didn't take me at my word when I told you that I could control my flames freely.

name: Non-Stop Pursuit, Jotaro
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 "Declaration of Destruction" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the beginning of your attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card, and this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】."
flavorText: Bastard's not getting away that easily!

name: Unrelenting Spirit, Kakyoin & H.G
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the bottom 4 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Free Way of Life, Iggy & T.F
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Bring it, feather boy! I can't wait to rip you to shreds!

name: Star of Hope, Jotaro & S.P
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, if "Destiny of the Joestar Family" is in your climax area, and you do not have another character in your center stage, this card gets +11000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [Put 2 "Star of Hope, Jotaro & S.P" from your hand into your waiting room & Put 4 cards from your hand into your waiting room] At the end of this card's attack, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent 7 times, and deal 7 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: True evil... are those who use the weak for their own gain... then crush them underfoot when they're through.

name: Knightly Spirit, Polnareff
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If you do not have another 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character in your clock, and put it at the bottom of your deck.

name: Faraway Journey
text: Put all cards from your hand into your waiting room, and draw X cards. X is equal to the number of cards put into your waiting room by this effect +1.

name: Farewell Friends
text: [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] You may pay the cost. If you do, deal 4 damage to your opponent 2 times. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Joseph: "But thanks to their sacrifices, we're here to tell the tale and carry on in their stead."

name: Emerald Splash
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: Sadness at Losing a Friend
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: I am sick of it. Having people up and die on me...

name: Declaration of Destruction
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: Destiny of the Joestar Family
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
